settings.title: About SNS Health
settings.content: Formerly known as Sports Nutrition Source, SNS Health was officially relaunched in January 2021. We are a performance-meets-wellness resource that offers a carefully curated selection of performance and wellness products designed to help our customers explore their full potential.

settings.title: Get 10% Off Your First Order
settings.subheading: Subscribe to our newsletter and get 10% off. Plus, be the first to find out about new products and sales from SNS Health.

settings.title: Personal Health Is Not One Size Fits All
settings.content:
Personal health is not a one-stop-shop. It is not a box to fit into or a trend to subscribe to. Personal health is about knowing yourself, your body and your mind; an ongoing journey between you - and only you. 

SNS Health encourages customers to define personal health on their terms. To create and work towards a vision of themselves that is unwavering in its commitment to being the best person they can be. Your journey, your products, your SNS Health.

settings.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.content: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.title: How to get in touch?
settings.answer:
The best way to get in touch with us is through email or submit a request on contact us page.

You are guaranteed to get a response from our team within 1 to 2 business days. Thank you for your patience. We look forward to assisting you.

settings.title: Is this the same company as Sports Nutrition Source?
settings.answer:
Same...but different! SNS Health is the new venture from the team behind Sports Nutrition Source; a transition that has been many years in the making as we began noticing a shift in the way our customers interpreted the meaning of “health.” For so long, this word solely represented physical fitness and performance - but what we’ve come to now understand (and embrace!) is that health also includes your mental and emotional wellbeing.

With this in mind, the Sports Nutrition Source team decided to combine these ideas of wellbeing to launch SNS Health. SNS Health is a performance-meets-wellness resource for consumers looking to create and maintain balance within their physical, mental and emotional wellbeing.

Although we said goodbye to Sports Nutrition Source as we once knew it, SNS Health carries the legacy we worked so hard to build into this new journey of total wellbeing. This allows us to support you in all areas of your wellness journey - whether it’s crushing a new personal record or trying to catch better zzz’s.

settings.title: Does SNS Health have any retail locations?
settings.answer:
We sure do. You can visit and shop at our retail location in Brampton, Ontario at:

2500 Williams Parkway, Unit 25-26, Brampton, Ontario, L6S 5M9.

settings.title: What kinds of products does SNS Health sell?
settings.answer: You’ll still find all of the performance-focused products we’ve become known for over the past 10 years on our website (proteins, amino acids, pre-workouts and more!) What’s new is our wellness offering, which ranges from supplements and vitamins to immunity support and sleep aids. Can’t find a product you’re looking for? Contact us here. Just like you, we’re constantly working to make ourselves even better.

settings.title: What if I want something that is out of stock?
settings.answer:
From time to time, this can happen! At SNS Health we never sacrifice the quality or integrity of our products, which is why we never substitute an alternative brand, product, or flavor without your permission. If an item is not expected to arrive at our warehouse within 48 hours of your order, we’ll always contact you directly with a suggestion for an alternate product that fits your needs. If we can’t find something you like, we’ll issue you an immediate refund - no questions asked.

In the meantime, you can request to be alerted when the product you’re eyeing is available for purchase by clicking on the “Notify When Back in Stock” button found on the product page. All you have to do is submit your email, and we’ll send you an automatic email with a link to purchase once its back on our (virtual!) shelves.

settings.title: I can’t decide between two different brands you have listed on your website. Can your team help me decide which product is best for me?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our team of experts would be happy to help with any questions you have. Feel free to fill out the contact form here with your inquiry and someone from SNS Health will get back to you within 24 hours.

settings.title: I’m looking for supplements to help with a medical diagnosis. Can your team help?
settings.answer: Thank you for coming to us with such an important decision! If your doctor has recommended you take a specific supplement or vitamin, we can definitely assist you. However, for all other inquiries we suggest contacting your doctor or healthcare provider as SNS Health cannot recommend treatments for medical diagnoses, conditions or diseases.

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer:
Our fulfillment center is open from 9 am to 5 pm, Monday through Friday.

Your order will be dispatched within 24-48 hours. We are proud of our current average fulfillment time of 14 hours. Please note that orders placed after 5 pm on Friday will be processed the following Monday.

However, during Christmas and New Year Holidays, our delivery times might be extended due to shipping disruptions expected from our carrier:

  • December 26th & 27th: Closed.
  • December 28th to 30th: Working.
  • December 31st to January 2nd: Closed.
  • January 3rd: Back to normal.

settings.title: How much is shipping?
settings.answer:
We offer free standard shipping for orders over $49. For orders under this amount, shipping is calculated at checkout.

If you can't wait to get your order sooner, we also offer express shipping options. Rates are calculated at checkout, based on your location.

settings.title: Do you offer a signature requirement option during checkout?
settings.answer:
Yes, we offer a signature requirement option during checkout. You can choose to require a signature at delivery for extra security, at no extra cost.

You can also choose to notify us regarding your delivery preferences by leaving instructions at checkout. Orders with comment "Leave at door" will be reconsidered without signature service.

If no signature is chosen, you will be fully responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to your package after delivery.

If we don't have a selected option from you, we will select signature at delivery as default option, to protect you from porch pirates.

settings.title: How do I return an item?
settings.answer: Take a look at our Shipping & Returns page here for all the details on our return policy and practices.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, Apple Pay and Paypal.

settings.title: Does SNS Health save my personal info?
settings.answer: Privacy is our #1 priority, which is why we offer a safe and secure shopping experience for our customers around the world. We use high-end secure technology to safeguard your details and never store your information unless you provide us with your permission. The only thing we store is the final four digits of your credit card, which are required for validating transactions.

settings.title: Is it possible to save even more on my order?
settings.answer: To stay up to date with seasonal promotions and sales, sign up to our newsletter.

settings.contact_2_heading: Any questions? Send us a message!
settings.contact_2_text:
If we still haven't answered your question, you can fill out our contact form.

Our support team will respond within 24 hours and is always happy to help!﻿

settings.heading: We’ll be back soon!
settings.text: Sorry for the inconvenience, we are performing some technical maintenance on the website. You can contact us here if you have any questions, otherwise we will be back online shortly! - The SNS Health Team
settings.newsletter_text: Leave us your email ID to stay in touch.

settings.title: PROBIOTICS

settings.title: About Us
settings.content: Formerly known as Sports Nutrition Source, SNS Health was officially relaunched in November 2021. Combining our 10 years of industry experience with a modern appreciation for physical, mental, and emotional well-being, we are a performance-meets-wellness resource that helps customers explore their full potential.

settings.title: “One of the best Sports Nutrition Stores in town. They carry large range of products and had everything that I required.”
“This company is the most organized and professional sports nutrition and health supplement organization I have seen...”
“I have been buying health nutrition from SNS for about 3-4 months  and i have had great experience.”
